text: Ergasii immoo inni Ahaaziyaa barbaacha ni deeme; namoonni Yehuus Samaariyaadhaa iddoo inni itti dhokatee turee qabanii Yehuutti fidanii isa ni ajjeesan. Isaanis, “Inni ilma Yehooshaafaax namicha garaa guutuudhaan Waaqayyoon barbaade sanaa ti” jedhanii isa ni awwaalan. Kanaafuu mana Ahaaziyaa keessaa namni aangoo mootummaa qabachuu dandaʼu tokko illee hin turre.
